backend/main.mo: Actor includes MixinStorage for blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking OG image deployment requirements to related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains textual summaries of multiple frontend source files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark/light theme foundations.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template including OG/Twitter metadata pointing to ogcard.jpg and loading the React app.
frontend/OG_PREVIEW_VERIFICATION.md: Documentation explaining how to verify OG/Twitter preview functionality and troubleshoot image accessibility issues.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister rules ensuring ogcard.jpg is uploaded with correct headers and caching.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists verified domains for IC boundary node domain validation.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Declares alternative origins for Internet Identity compatibility.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component enabling dark mode and rendering LandingPage within an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveBackg: Canvas-based interactive background rendering a cursor‑reactive mesh with fade and movement effects.
frontend/src/components/PersonalModeCont: Scroll-driven personal-mode section with background preloading, section fade-ins, and a carousel hint animation; renders project cards and manages UI state.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalMode: Professional-mode view with background loading, scroll-triggered animations, expandable sections, and sequential reveal of timeline, experience, ecosystem, and tool items.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Reusable project card with thumbnail, modal overlay, image carousel scrolling, and YouTube embed handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored-identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeSelectorRemeas: Hook that increments a counter on window or element resize to trigger layout recalculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook wired to the actor, ready for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration plus theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom UI styles for mode selectors and global elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the animated landing screen with mode selection, media preloading, audio/tap feedback, and state-driven transitions for personal/professional views.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme tokens, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s current features, versions, and high-level summary of the portfolio app’s UX and infrastructure.
